plot: Homer gives Moe an enormous amount of money so he doesn't have to close down.

Moe's health inspector, an old friend and therefore not very strict, dies and the new health inspector closes Moe's down. Homer gets a new mortgage for his home and gives Moe the money so Moe can clear up all the violations. Marge decides to protect her investment by going in business with Moe.—Marco van Hoof <k_luifje7@hotmail.com>
